languages.text: "Милосердие Лорд-капитана велико — лучше бы проктору помнить об этом и быть благодарным до конца дней своих".

traits.locale_text: "Милосердие Лорд-капитана велико — лучше бы проктору помнить об этом и быть благодарным до конца дней своих".

languages.text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."
languages.original_text: "Милосердие Лорд-капитана велико — лучше бы проктору помнить об этом и быть благодарным до конца дней своих".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

"The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの慈悲はまことにすばらしい。あの代理人はそのことをよく胸に刻み、生涯感謝を忘れないでください」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの慈悲はまことにすばらしい。あの代理人はそのことをよく胸に刻み、生涯感謝を忘れないでください」

languages.text: "Die Gnade des Lord Captains ist in der Tat groß. Der Proktor täte gut daran, das nicht zu vergessen und den Rest seines Lebens Dankbarkeit zu zeigen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gnade des Lord Captains ist in der Tat groß. Der Proktor täte gut daran, das nicht zu vergessen und den Rest seines Lebens Dankbarkeit zu zeigen."

languages.text: « Il est vrai que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a fait preuve d'une grande clémence. J'espère que le proctor se souviendra de son geste et lui en sera éternellement reconnaissant. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a fait preuve d'une grande clémence. J'espère que le proctor se souviendra de son geste et lui en sera éternellement reconnaissant. »

languages.text: «La clemencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán es digna de encomio; el Procurador haría bien en recordarla y mostrarse agradecido durante el resto de su vida».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

traits.locale_text: «La clemencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán es digna de encomio; el Procurador haría bien en recordarla y mostrarse agradecido durante el resto de su vida».

languages.text: “舰长大人确实非常仁慈。那个监察官最好能记住这一点，在他的余生里心怀感激。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人确实非常仁慈。那个监察官最好能记住这一点，在他的余生里心怀感激。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan merhametli çıktı. Üsteğmen, bu iyiliği hayatı boyunca unutmamalı."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's mercy is great indeed — the Proctor had better remember it well and remain grateful for the rest of his life."
